qas.question: What year was Bern occupied by French troops?
Why were French troops in Bern?
When did Bern regain control of Bernese Oberland?
What new territory was aquired in 1814?
When did the canton of Jura seceed?

context: Bern was occupied by French troops in <a0_0>1798<a0_0/> during the <a1_0>French Revolutionary Wars<a1_0/>, when it was stripped of parts of its territories. It regained control of the Bernese Oberland in <a2_0>1802<a2_0/>, and following the Congress of Vienna of 1814, it newly acquired the <a3_0>Bernese Jura.<a3_0/> At this time, it once again became the largest canton of the confederacy as it stood during the Restoration and until the secession of the canton of Jura in <a4_0>1979<a4_0/>. Bern was made the Federal City (seat of the Federal Assembly) within the new Swiss federal state in 1848.
